snippet: House Speaker John A. Boehner of Ohio said he is ready to accept a budget deal that raises federal revenues as long as it is linked to an overhaul of entitlements and a reform of the tax code that closes loopholes, curtails or eliminates deductions...
abstract: House Speaker John A. Boehner of Ohio said he is ready to accept a budget deal that raises federal revenues as long as it is linked to an overhaul of entitlements and a reform of the tax code that closes loopholes, curtails or eliminates deductions and lowers income tax rates.

headline.main: Boehner Strikes Conciliatory Tone on 'Fiscal Cliff'
